user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me (sarah.connor@investments.com) a summary of our discussion from the Global Business Hub meeting, and remind him to review his Notion for the details.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me (sarah.connor@investments.com) a concise summary of our discussion from the Global Business Hub meeting? When you have a moment, please also review the related notes in your Notion workspace to ensure everything aligns before you send it over.

Many thanks for your help!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:
